name: Average CVSS >= 5 and Privileged
description: Alert on deployments with an average CVSS score >= 5 and running in Privileged Mode
rationale: If an image has a vulnerability with a CVSS score greater than 7 and the corresponding container is running as privileged, the container may pose an unnecessarily high risk of exploitation and privilege escalation.
remediation: Speak with your security team to identify and mitigate the vulnerabilities or run your container with fewer privileges.
